title: About Us
body_html:
G'day! Welcome to Vapelink.

We're a vape shop based in Coburg North, Melbourne. We've been running since 2019 and we're all vapers ourselves — so we know our stuff and we actually use the products we sell.

We stock everything from starter kits and mods to e-liquids, coils, pods, and accessories. If there's something new on the market, we've probably got it (or we're getting it in soon).

Not sure what to get? Just ask. We're happy to point you in the right direction based on what you're after — no pressure, no upselling.

We ship Australia-wide and orders over $100 get free shipping. You can also pop into our Coburg North store if you're local.

Come say g'day — online or in person!

Disposable vapes has become the most popular form of vaping recently and if you love disposable vapes or if you want to try this new form of vaping, you must have wondered from where you can buy disposable vapes near me in Australia. The answer is Vapelink. Disposable vapes at our vape store in Melbourne are of best quality, available at low price, and there are variety of delicious flavours to choose from.

Where Are We Located?

Our vape shop is located in Coburg, Melbourne. If you are not in Melbourne, don't worry. You can buy disposable vapes from our online vape shop. We ship disposable vapes provide Australia wide. Also if the order amount is $100 or above, we provide express free shipping. Whether you are searching for disposable vapes in Melbourne, disposable vapes in Sydney, disposable vapes in Perth, disposable vapes in Adelaide, disposable vapes in Brisbane, or no matter where you are located in Australia, we have got you covered.

What Are The Main Reasons Behind Sudden Popularity of Disposable Vapes in Australia?

Disposable vapes, also known as disposable pod systems, disposable pods, or disposable e-cigarettes have suddenly became so popular is because of the flexibility. Here are some of the main advantages of disposable vapes:

Disposable vapes are available at low price:

Disposable vapes, as well as refillable vapes, are less expensive than traditional cigarettes and will save you money in the long term. Because they are not refillable, disposable vapes are less expensive than refilling vapes. If you plan on vaping for a long time, disposable vapes will cost you a lot more in the long run, so you're better off buying a refillable vape instead. When you buy a new disposable vape, you're buying everything from scratch, including the battery, circuit, and E Liquid. Disposable Vapes will save you money while you're deciding whether or not vaping is right for you.

Disposable vapes are easily accessible:

In Melbourne, people choose to buy the most accessible products that are readily available to them. Disposable vapes are made in such a way that they are lightweight and do not require E Liquid refills in light of this fact. Furthermore, because these are not rechargeable and have a single lifespan, there is no need to bring a battery or a battery charger, reducing the burden and freeing up space for other items. If you are a frequent travelling or have to take a lot of stuff with you on a daily basis, having a disposable vape in your suitcase will save up space in your bag for other items.

Disposable vapes are perfect for beginners:

Disposable Vapes, as previously stated, are ideal for folks who are new to vaping. Disposable vapes aid new vapers who aren't familiar with setting up a brand new device because they don't require any difficult device setup. Because disposable vapes don't require any assembly or setup, you can easily skip this step. You can start vaping right away after unboxing your new disposable vape in Melbourne. It is simply discarded once it has been used. Also, please make sure that you discard disposable vapes in a responsible way.

title: TERMS & CONDITIONS
body_html:
All listings are subject to change at any time, all illustration photos are used as a guide on the products you will need to read the descriptions as to know hat you are purchasing and need to choose correct variants 

All ecig devices come with a 90 day warranty against manufactures defect, if you believe your item is defective you will need to send back to us at your expense, item needs to be original packaging as serial numbers are required for us to process a claim against manufacture warranty claim on the item. title: Privacy Policy
body_html:
Privacy Policy

Last updated: February 2026

This page covers how Vapelink handles your personal information when you use our website (vapelink.com.au) or buy from us. We take your privacy seriously and operate in line with Australian privacy law.

1. What We Collect

When you shop with us, create an account, sign up for emails or get in touch, we may collect:

  • Your details: Name, date of birth (we need this for age verification), email, phone number, delivery and billing address
  • Order info: What you bought, how you paid, order history
  • Technical stuff: IP address, browser type, device info, cookies, what pages you looked at
  • Marketing preferences: Whether you want to hear from us or not

2. What We Do With It

Pretty straightforward:

  • Process and send your orders
  • Check that you're 18 or older (it's the law)
  • Get back to you about orders or questions
  • Send you deals and updates (only if you've opted in)
  • Make the website better
  • Meet our legal obligations
  • Catch dodgy activity

3. Who We Share It With

We only share your info when we have to:

  • Australia Post / couriers: So they can deliver your order
  • Payment processors: To handle payments securely
  • Google Analytics: Anonymised data to help us improve the site
  • Authorities: If Australian law requires it

We don't sell or rent your info to anyone.

4. Cookies

Our site uses cookies to work properly and to remember your cart, preferences, etc. You can manage cookies in your browser settings, but turning off essential ones will break things.

5. Security

We use standard security measures to keep your data safe. That said, nothing online is bulletproof — no one can guarantee 100% security over the internet.

6. How Long We Keep It

We hold onto your info for as long as we need it. Order records stick around for 7 years because that's what Australian tax law requires.

7. Your Rights

Under the Privacy Act 1988 (Cth) and the Australian Privacy Principles, you can:

  • Ask to see what info we have on you
  • Ask us to fix anything that's wrong
  • Ask us to delete your data (within legal limits)
  • Unsubscribe from marketing emails anytime
  • Lodge a complaint with the OAIC if you're not happy with how we've handled things

8. Kids

You need to be 18+ to use this site and buy vaping products. We don't knowingly collect info from anyone under 18, and if we find out we have, we'll delete it.

9. Updates

We might update this policy from time to time. If we do, the new version will be posted here with the date it was changed.

10. Questions?

Get in touch if you have any questions about this policy:

  • Email: info@vapelink.com
  • Location: Coburg North, Melbourne, VIC, Australia

title: Refund & Returns Policy
body_html:
Refund & Returns Policy

Last updated: February 2026

We get it — sometimes things don't work out. Here's how returns and refunds work at Vapelink, all in line with Australian Consumer Law.

1. Your Consumer Rights

Under Australian Consumer Law, you're entitled to a replacement or refund if a product is:

  • Faulty or defective
  • Not what was described
  • Not fit for purpose
  • Not up to acceptable quality

These rights can't be waived — they apply no matter what.

2. Changed Your Mind?

No stress. We accept change-of-mind returns within 14 days of delivery, as long as the item is:

  • Unused, unopened and still in its sealed packaging
  • In a condition we can resell
  • Accompanied by your proof of purchase

We can't accept returns on:

  • Opened e-liquids or vape juices (hygiene reasons)
  • Used coils or pods
  • Clearance / final sale items
  • Gift cards

3. Got a Faulty Item?

Let us know within 30 days of delivery. Send us:

  • Your order number
  • What's wrong with it
  • A photo or video showing the issue

We'll sort it out — replacement, repair, or refund depending on the situation.

4. Starting a Return

Email us at info@vapelink.com with the subject "Return Request — [Your Order Number]". We'll send you return instructions and a return authorisation.

Don't send anything back before getting in touch with us first.

5. Who Pays for Return Shipping?

  • Faulty product: We cover it
  • Change of mind: That's on you

6. Getting Your Refund

Once we get the item back and have a look at it, we'll let you know if the refund is approved.

  • Approved refunds go back to your original payment method within 5–10 business days
  • Original shipping costs aren't refunded (unless we sent you the wrong thing or it was faulty)

7. Exchanges

Want to swap for a different variant of the same product? Just email us at info@vapelink.com and we'll see what's available.

8. Damaged During Shipping

If your order turns up damaged, contact us within 48 hours of delivery with photos of the packaging and product. We'll send a replacement or refund — no extra cost to you.

9. Questions?

For any return or refund queries:

  • Email: info@vapelink.com
  • Location: Coburg North, Melbourne, VIC, Australia

title: Shipping Policy
body_html:
Shipping Policy

Last updated: February 2026

We ship from our Melbourne warehouse to everywhere in Australia. Here's everything you need to know about getting your order.

1. Shipping Options

MethodTimeframeCost
Standard (Australia Post)3–7 business days$9.95
Express (Australia Post Express)1–3 business days$14.95
Free Standard Shipping3–7 business daysFREE on orders over $100
Click & Collect (Coburg North, VIC)Same day when readyFREE

2. Processing Time

We pack and ship orders within 1–2 business days (Mon–Fri, not public holidays). If you order after 2:00 PM AEST, it'll likely go out the next business day.

You'll get a confirmation email with tracking details once it's on its way.

3. Where We Ship

We deliver to all Australian states and territories: VIC, NSW, QLD, SA, WA, TAS, NT, ACT.

We don't ship internationally.

4. Tracking

Once your order ships, you'll get a tracking number via email. Track it at auspost.com.au.

5. Where's My Order?

If it hasn't shown up within the expected timeframe:

  1. Check your tracking number for updates
  2. Ask your neighbours or check your local post office
  3. Email us at info@vapelink.com and we'll follow it up with Aus Post

6. Signature Required

Orders over $150, or orders with restricted items, may need a signature on delivery. Someone 18+ will need to be there to sign.

7. PO Boxes

We can ship to PO Box addresses with standard shipping. Express isn't available for PO Boxes.

8. Age Check

By law, you need to be 18+ to buy vaping products in Australia. We verify age on all orders and can cancel any order if we can't confirm it.

9. State Regulations

Some vape products have different rules depending on the state. We follow all applicable Australian laws when it comes to selling and shipping vaping products.

10. Questions?

Email us about any shipping queries:

  • Email: info@vapelink.com
  • Location: Coburg North, Melbourne, VIC, Australia

title: Frequently Asked Questions (FAQ)
body_html:
Frequently Asked Questions

Got questions? Here are the ones we get asked the most.

Ordering & Payments

What payment methods do you accept?

Bank transfer, PayID, Bitcoin, and in-store payments at our Coburg North shop. All prices are in AUD.

Do I need to be 18+?

Yes — it's a legal requirement in Australia. We check age at checkout and might ask for ID.

Can I change or cancel my order?

If we haven't shipped it yet, email us at info@vapelink.com.au as soon as possible and we'll see what we can do. Once it's been shipped, we can't cancel it.

Shipping & Delivery

How long does delivery take?

Standard shipping is 3–7 business days. Express is 1–3 business days. We usually process orders within 1–2 business days.

Is there free shipping?

Yep — free standard shipping on all orders over $100 within Australia.

Do you ship overseas?

Nah, Australia only at the moment. We ship to all states and territories though.

Can I track my parcel?

Once it's shipped you'll get an email with your Australia Post tracking number.

Products

Is everything genuine?

100%. We get our stock directly from authorised distributors. No knockoffs.

What brands do you stock?

SMOK, Vaporesso, GeekVape, Voopoo, Uwell, Aspire, Innokin, FreeMax, and a heap more. Check the collections page to browse by brand.

Do you sell nicotine e-liquids?

We sell nicotine-free e-liquids. For anything with nicotine, you'll need to look into the current Australian regulations — a prescription from a registered doctor may be required.

Returns & Refunds

What's your return policy?

14-day returns on unused, unopened products. Faulty items are covered under Australian Consumer Law. Full details on our Refund & Returns Policy page.

How do I return something faulty?

Email info@vapelink.com.au with your order number, what's wrong, and a photo. We'll take it from there and cover the return postage.

Store & Contact

Can I come in?

Yeah, we've got a shop in Coburg North, Melbourne. Pop in for a browse, click & collect, or if you just want to chat about gear.

How do I get in touch?

Email us at info@vapelink.com.au. We usually reply within 24 hours on business days.

What are your opening hours?

Hours can vary, so drop us an email to check. The online shop is open 24/7 at vapelink.com.au.

title: Cookies Policy
body_html:
Cookies Policy

Last updated: February 2026

This page explains how Vapelink (vapelink.com.au) uses cookies and similar tracking technologies. By continuing to browse our site, you agree to the use of cookies as described below.

What Are Cookies?

Cookies are small text files that get stored on your device when you visit a website. They help the site remember things like your preferences, what's in your cart, and whether you've visited before. Some expire when you close your browser, others hang around for a while.

How We Use Cookies

Here's a breakdown of the cookies we use:

Essential Cookies

These are needed for the site to work properly. Without them, things like your shopping cart and age verification wouldn't function.

  • Cart data: Remembers your cart contents while you browse
  • Age verification: Stores your age confirmation so you don't have to verify every page
  • Cookie consent: Remembers that you've accepted or dismissed the cookie notice

Functional Cookies

These help improve your experience by remembering your preferences:

  • Recent searches: Saves your last few searches to speed things up
  • Account preferences: Keeps you logged in if you have an account

Analytics Cookies

We use tools like Google Analytics to understand how people use the site, which pages get the most traffic, and where we can improve. This data is anonymised — we can't identify individuals from it.

  • Google Analytics: Tracks page visits, time on site, bounce rate, and similar metrics

Third-Party Cookies

Some cookies come from services we use, not directly from us. We don't control these — they have their own policies:

  • Google: Analytics and fonts – Google Privacy Policy

Managing Cookies

You can control cookies through your browser settings. Every browser is a bit different, but you can usually find cookie settings in the Privacy or Security section. Here's where to look:

  • Chrome
  • Firefox
  • Safari
  • Edge

Bear in mind that blocking essential cookies will stop parts of the site from working — your cart won't save, for example.

Updates

We might update this policy as we change the site or add new features. Any updates will be posted on this page.

Questions?

If you have any concerns about how we use cookies:

  • Email: info@vapelink.com.au
  • Location: Coburg North, Melbourne, VIC, Australia
